title: misc: hg undo is broken
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg undo NNNN
2. fill out details
3. receive a few pages of html in an error message

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

hg undo creates an undo CL without error.

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.

Possibly related to rietveld enforcing SSL.
